title: Amazon Labor Day sale 2021: the best deals on appliances, tablets, wireless earphones and more
author: claudia-watkins
summary: The Amazon Labor Day Savings event has now launched
article: The Amazon Labor Day sales are now live and we're seeing some excellent savings on everything from laptops, TVs, audio equipment to kitchen appliances, and plenty more. To help you find the best savings, we've selected some of the best deals featured in this year's sale event.

Labor Day sales are officially here, so what's on sale at Amazon? The Amazon Labor Day savings event is best known for it's discounts on a range of small appliances, and top-rated tech products, and this year is no different. We're seeing some standout deals on Apple products, including $100 off the iPad Air 4, and $150 off the 2020 MacBook Pro. You'll also find up to 60% off a range of Amazon's best-selling devices, including the all-new Echo Dot 8 and Fire TV Stick.

As predicted, kitchen appliances have also made a feature in this year's sale event. We've got household names like Instant Pot with some of their most popular appliances at record low prices with the Duo Crisp 11 in 1 for just $149.95 (was $199.99). There's some incredible deals on household appliances, with great savings on floor care items, with up to $150 off the iRobot Roomba i7+ vacuum cleaner and $30 off a selection of Hoover vacuums.

If you’re a savvy deals-hunter looking for the next biggest sale event before Black Friday, then it's definitely worth having a browse through some of the deals at Amazon. With a vast amount of products to scroll through on the website, we've rounded up some of the best deals available at the Amazon Labor Day savings event today.
